rule: For "Company names", the assistant must extract all company names mentioned in the text, where a company name is the official name of a legally recognized business organization.
input: Text: Tesla and SolarCity are working together on renewable energy projects.
coverage:
Company names: Tesla, SolarCity
People names: 
Specific topics: renewable energy projects
General themes: collaboration, sustainability
validityText:
The given input is a string of text provided under the key 'text'. It mentions company names (Tesla and SolarCity) and refers to the topic of renewable energy projects. According to the input specification, the text may include mentions of company names, people names, specific topics, and general themes. The input complies with this specification as it includes both company names and a specific topic. There are no elements in the input that violate the rules set forth by the input specification. The input adheres to the requirement of being a string of text, and it meets the criteria of including permissible content.

No violation.
OK
